Title: 2024: The year of AI in B2B video marketing

"As AI becomes embedded in B2B video, marketers must anchor campaigns in human insights and measurable business outcomes. Context: Agency perspective on AI video marketing cautioning against overpromising automation and urging proof of creative leadership.
